verses.name: Judges 9:52
verses.text: And Abimelech came unto the tower, and fought against it, and went hard unto the door of the tower to burn it with fire.

verses.name: Judges 9:53
verses.text: And a certain woman cast a piece of a millstone upon Abimelech’s head, and all to brake his skull.

verses.name: Judges 9:54
verses.text: Then he called hastily unto the young man his armourbearer, and said unto him, Draw thy sword, and slay me, that men say not of me, A woman slew him. And his young man thrust him through, and he died.
